p: However, a recent meta-analysis of randomized controlled trial (39,195 subjects; median duration of treatment 11.5 months; median dose of niacin 2 g/day in monotherapy or in combination with other component versus placebo/usual care or other component alone) showed no reduction with niacin in mortality, cardiovascular mortality, fatal or non-fatal myocardial infarction nor fatal or non-fatal strokes but niacin was associated with side effects [ 149].
